title: Hi, This Is My Penis
overview: This sympathetic, but profound and essential investigation, led by Kim LÃ©vesque-Lizotte, aims to clarify why men send photos of their penises. What is behind their "dick pics"? What do these pictures symbolize? Desire, power, exhibitionism, narcissism, sexism, fear of rejection? To find out, the documentary tries to elicit answers from both sides.
